newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine seed crusher says in deal with Glencore.
newsitem.headline: Argentine seed crusher says in deal with Glencore.

text.p: Grain and energy traders Glencore have signed an agreement taking out an option to purchase 51 percent of privately-held Argentine oilseed crusher Oleaginosa Moreno SA, a Moreno official said Wednesday.
Moreno operations manager Emilio Moreno confirmed the agreement to Reuters but further details were not immediately available. No Glencore official could be reached for comment.
Moreno, which mainly crushes sunflower seed, has a capacity of 2,500 tonnes a day at plants in the southern Buenos Aires province ports of Bahia Blanca and Necochea.
